title: New docs reveal Epstein's death statement dated before he was found dead
summary_full: Newly released Justice Department files indicate a federal statement announcing Jeffrey Epstein's death was dated August 9, 2019, a day before he was found unresponsive in his New York cell. The statement from the Manhattan US Attorney's Office confirmed his death and reiterated commitment to victims.
